original: intros x H. destruct (inv_com Z multZ IZ x (conj multZ_commutativity (proj2 Z_unitary_commutative_ring x (proj2 H)))) as [y Hy]. destruct x, y. - left. apply mult_OZ in Hy. simpl in Hy. symmetry in Hy. destruct Hy. reflexivity. - left. apply (ssrfun.etrans Hy). apply mult_IZ. - right. apply mult_oppZ_l in Hy. simpl in Hy. apply mult_OZ in Hy. symmetry in Hy. rewrite <- tech_multZ_negO in Hy. symmetry in Hy. auto. - left. auto. - left. symmetry in Hy. apply mult_oppZ_r in Hy. simpl in Hy. apply mult_mIZ in Hy. destruct Hy. reflexivity. - exfalso. apply (tech_integ_negZ n (pos n0)). rewrite Hy. apply multZ_neutral. - left. rewrite (ssrfun.esym (tech_multZ_negO x)). rewrite <- mult_oppZ_l in Hy. rewrite mult_IZ in Hy. rewrite tech_multZ_negO in Hy. reflexivity. - right. rewrite mult_oppZ_l in Hy. rewrite mult_IZ in Hy. rewrite tech_multZ_negO in Hy. auto.
